channel.title: Sofia the Beautiful on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Sofia the Beautiful on Game6r

item.title: Game Sofia the First in the floating palace
item.description: Princess Sofia decided to play cards with the wizard Cedric. You need to help the girl beat the opponent. The essence of the game is simple: you need to guess what cards the opponent has. If you select the correct option, Cedric will give these cards to the heroine. But if you make a mistake, you have to take a card from the deck.

item.title: Sophia Magic Spells game
item.description: Go to the royal palace to meet the cute princess Sofia. Together with her you can have a great time doing a variety of tasks. Carefully follow the game prompts to act as correctly as possible. You will definitely enjoy the fascinating process dedicated to the cartoon girl.
